description: Lists all GuardDuty membership invitations that were sent to the current Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the account that the invitation was sent from.

nested_items.name: InvitationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the invitation. This value is used to validate the inviter account to the member account.

nested_items.name: RelationshipStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the relationship between the inviter and invitee accounts.

nested_items.name: InvitedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the invitation was sent.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination parameter to be used on the next list operation to retrieve more items.
